name: Yellowjacket
description:
Yellowjacket is a brutal side-scrolling brawler inspired by 90s media such as Spawn and The Crow.
Resurrected by a demon as a being made of blood, the player must be creative with this precious resource that both keeps them alive and fuels their abilities as they paint the city red while seeking vengeance on the so-called-hero that murdered them.

Programming, design, additional art, and writing by Joshua Benwell.
Art by Sam Simon.
Additional programming by Zoie Boyd.
Additional design Daffyd Griffith.
